law.text: Any person aggrieved by a decision or ruling of the board may obtain review thereof by filing a written petition in the Circuit Court of jurisdiction as provided in KRS 13B.140.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 179, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 20, effective July 13, 1984.
